perturbation.original_text: Payment Terms. Except as set forth in such Part 3 of Exhibit "A", payments from Co-Host to NAI shall be due thirty (30) days from the date of invoice. All payments will be made in United States dollars, free of any taxes then currently applicable, at the address designated above by NAI. Late payments shall bear interest at the lesser of: (i) the maximum rate permitted by law, and (ii) the rate of 1.5% per month from the due date until paid.
perturbation.changed_text: Payment Terms. Except as set forth in such Part 3 of Exhibit "A", payments from Co-Host to NAI shall be due thirty (30) days from the date of invoice. However, all payments for invoices exceeding $100,000 shall be due sixty (60) days from the date of the invoice. All payments will be made in United States dollars, free of any taxes then currently applicable, at the address designated above by NAI. Late payments shall bear interest at the lesser of: (i) the maximum rate permitted by law, and (ii) the rate of 1.5% per month from the due date until paid.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the payment terms. The original text states that payments are due in 30 days, while the modified text adds an exception where larger invoices have 60 days to be paid. This creates ambiguity and could lead to disputes over payment deadlines.

Co-Host shall pay to NAI a "Co-Hosting Fee" in the following amounts:
